channel.title: How to fix "could not find or load main class Davidscape.server"
channel.description:
when i try to run the game in like the cmd promt it says
error: could not find or load main class davidscape.server press any key to continue
if you help i know how to code etc its going to be a good server considering im co owner in a server and alot of my friends from there are joining me ill make you admin and if you help out with starting up server ill give you co if you want it either way.

item.title: How to fix "could not find or load main class Davidscape.server"
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

try

@echo off cd ../bin color 0a Title DavidScape 508 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_05\bin\java.exe" pause

@echo off cd ../bin color 0a Title DavidScape 508 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix "could not find or load main class Davidscape.server"

item.title: How to fix "could not find or load main class Davidscape.server"
item.dc:creator: @leoni3545 leoni3545
item.description:
@leoni3545 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:543341”]You must have moved the files/folders around. It doesn’t have the right classpath set. Can you paste whats inside the run.bat file when you edit it, and show us a screenshot of the folder that has the DavidScape folder?

[quote author=Pure_ link=topic=662218.msg4426105#msg4426105 date=1400901994]
Make sure you are referencing the root source folder properly and make sure the main class is referenced properly (I doubt it’s Davidscape.server).
[/quote]I think it is, actually. But with a capital S (assuming the OP just forgot the capital in his post)[/quote]

yea “@echo off
cd …/bin
color 0a
Title DavidScape 508
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_05\bin\java.exe” DavidScape\Server 43594
pause" it is if you could help me with team viewer very well apreciated or skype.

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix "could not find or load main class Davidscape.server"

item.title: How to fix "could not find or load main class Davidscape.server"
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You must have moved the files/folders around. It doesn’t have the right classpath set. Can you paste whats inside the run.bat file when you edit it, and show us a screenshot of the folder that has the DavidScape folder?

[quote=“Pure_, post:2, topic:543341”]Make sure you are referencing the root source folder properly and make sure the main class is referenced properly (I doubt it’s Davidscape.server).[/quote]I think it is, actually. But with a capital S (assuming the OP just forgot the capital in his post)

Read full topic
